parameters.subject: Pasovit Technologies - Round 1 task
parameters.html:
=

Hi {{ $json.question_2eXade.value }},

Thank you for your interest in the Graphic Designer role. As the next step in our evaluation process, we’re assigning you a practical design task.

Before you start, it is mandatory that you read all instructions in the Google Doc linked below. This document contains the complete brief, expectations, and submission requirements. Missing any instruction will directly impact your evaluation.

Task Instructions (Read Carefully):
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1oNNDTEdoZlCLs26byV2lnsC-TAXq25SPNo-jlF8_mqk/edit

Submission Instructions (Important)

Do NOT reply to this email with your files.

All submissions must be done as follows:

  1. Upload all required files to Google Drive
  2. Set access to “Anyone with the link can view”
  3. Submit the Google Drive link via the form below

Submission Form:
https://tally.so/r/obRQEe

Deadline

The deadline is 11:59 PM (your local time) on {{ (() => { const d = new Date(Date.now()); d.setDate(d.getDate() + 4); return d.toLocaleDateString('en-GB'); })() }} .

Late or incorrectly submitted entries will not be reviewed.

What Happens Next

Candidates who perform well on this task will be shortlisted for an interview. This task is the primary screening step, so follow instructions precisely.

If you have questions, clarify them early. We’re evaluating execution, attention to detail, and your ability to follow a brief.

Best regards,
Team Pasovit
